name: multifilament
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A multifilament thread consists of several filaments (= thin threads or fibres): It is made of strong multifilament yarn. The company makes multi-filament polyester and nylon textured yarns.
More examplesFewer examplesOlder nets should be replaced by biodegradable multifilament nets made out of a material like cotton.It's a thermoplastic multifilament yarn that's used as a high-strength reinforcement. Virtually all synthetic strings today have more than one strand of fibre in them; therefore, they are multifilament. Multifilament mesh has been associated with chronic inflammation.
